\[ 221 \text{ episodes} \times 45 \text{ minutes/episode} = 9945 \text{ minutes} \]

Converting this to hours:

\[ \frac{9945 \text{ minutes}}{60 \text{ minutes/hour}} = 165.75 \text{ hours} \]

If you have 180 days to watch the series, the daily viewing time required is:

\[ \frac{165.75 \text{ hours}}{180 \text{ days}} \approx 0.92 \text{ hours/day} \]

This is approximately 55 minutes per day, which is a feasible and manageable amount of time. Therefore, you could indeed watch all of "JAG" in six months if you dedicate about 55 minutes per day.
